players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night and confirmed it. We should vote for her to protect the town."
Bob: "Everyone, trust me—Alice is the mafioso. She threatened Charlie, and my investigation confirms it. Vote for her now to save us."
